reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with how helpful and polite all the employees from cashiers to floor staff. Been a long time since Ive been in a store where the staff knew where the items I needed were and even guided me to the products. One item didnt have the measurements I was looking for and they offered to phone the  manufacture to get the details. After a bad experience with other store in richmond, this will be my go to from now on. Thank you for your excellent customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Phyllis, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I had a great experience at Canadian Tire! The staff was incredibly helpful, and the atmosphere was welcoming. The positive attitude of the staff made my visit enjoyable, and I appreciate the excellent customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Farid, we really appreciate the 5 stars! See you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tire in Richmond, BC, is a reliable go-to for all your household and outdoor needs. This store has a wide selection of products, from automotive supplies to home improvement tools, making it a versatile one-stop shop. The knowledgeable staff members are always ready to assist and provide helpful recommendations. The well-organized aisles and clear signage make navigation easy, ensuring a convenient shopping experience. Whether youre tackling a DIY project, stocking up on outdoor gear, or simply browsing for home essentials, Canadian Tire in Richmond has you covered. Its a trusted destination for quality products and friendly service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Had a couple of keys cut here recently but, they turned out to be the wrong ones. Ralph in auto parts replaced them for me right away. Great service! Thank you Ralph!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there! Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Ralph. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I bought this Hardhat at Canadian Tire. Attaching the head strap was a real challenge Roman spent close to 20min helping me figure it out. A big Shout Out and thank you, Roman!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Gerald! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Roman. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Richmond Canadian Tire is located next to the future Capstan Station. Like all Canadian tires, the shop sells various tools, machines, and everything you will need for your household, outdoor needs, DIY projects, toys, scooter, skateboard, bike and bike accessories, of course, it includes a car repair factory. Overall, most Canadian tires will have everything of what you need. Well, transportation is also convenient, such as buses and skytrains and many shops are around this store. I will recommend this store.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your review! Were happy to provide you with everything that you need. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I had a deflated tire. Went in first thing in the morning at 9:00. Ahmed and the repair crew fixed the tire and I got the vehicle back in two hours. Although they were very busy that day, the service was still delivered properly. Sunday is a little bit slow comparing to the workdays maybe because the managers are not on site.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Leo! See you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian tire has numerous items beyond just automotive parts. They did have some electrical connectors that other parts store had run out of. Good place?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Terry! We hope to see you again very soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Their sales are great. Sometimes they put items for %70 on sale. This is fantastic! Regular prices are not really attractive but sales are. They also are Canadian brand which we should support them, and I personally expect them to adjust regular prices to more affordable for middle class people.
I am very happy the work of Mr Cesar S Jaen service advisor to change my tire he is very helpful he really work for customer with his heart  thank you so much . Ludia Li
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review. We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: A handy store with a very wide range of products. Items are nicely and clearly displayed. I hope they will put up a self check out counter so we dont have to fall into long lines when paying. PS self check out stations still not there, as of July 2023
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star rating! We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: New management team and shop staff for this Auto Service location is GREAT! They are the old team from the Steveston location. AVOID THE NEW STEVESTON TEAM THAT USED TO WORK HERE
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cayman, were glad to hear you enjoyed the service. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: You can find most everything you need to enjoy the season, repair the car or appliance or care for your home and garden. Helpful sales staff and great prices.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Gregory. We love hearing from great customers like you! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Always the best store to get anything I am looking for: garden, camping, home repairs [toilets, sinks,], Christmas decorations. They have it all.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thats great to hear, Miguel! Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I had such wonderful customer service at this location. I had the bad luck of a flat tire today and the manager of the auto service shop (I think he was the manager?) was so helpful. He was friendly, funny, and made what should have been a very stressful situation much more manageable. Truly a gentleman and a delight!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Talia, Were happy to hear you enjoyed the service. We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: The Best Toyota Dealer in Town
Ramneek was very helpful and patient to help us in return and store credit
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! We look forward to seeing you again soon. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Ive always been a skeptical about Canadian Tire Auto but boyfriend insisted. There we were met by Bertrand...omg! He was so helpful! He set us up with headlights, fog lights, air filter and windshield wipers...thank so much and definitely will shop there again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Keva, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Bertrand. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome place to get all the household/ professional tools and many other items.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star review! We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I saw Canadian tire  tires on sale from Apr 14 2023 and Canadian tires be able to reserved my tires until appointment time. Actually right now some locations tires clearance, got my self Pirelli SUV all season regular price $ 264 per tire and got for $164 per tire, great deal, excellent service at No.3 Road Richmond BC.

reviews.review_text: Always have affordable options and the stock info available on the website is really convenient.

reviews.review_text: Ralph the manager of service auto department was very helpful when I needed to replace a dead battery unexpectedly.  It was late just before closing and and I passing through on way back to Kelowna.  Thanks again Ralph!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Robert! We really appreciate the 5 stars! See you soon. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Good sales ,not too much on sale, when shopping on August 8th we got a parking ticket, why cost me a 102 dollars   bad for your business
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I like this chain. It is like tire store meets home goods meets tools and sporting goods. Great for #vanlife. EDIT: just the fact they replied to my previous 4-star rating... 5 STARS.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 4-star rating. We hope to make your next visit a 5-star one! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great service and nice staffs. Huge selection of everything you need the most for home repair, materials, homeware, auto parts, and so on. Lots of free parking available on site.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were glad to hear you had a great experience at our store, King. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Best place ever. Where else can you get a cordless drill, hip waders, ice skates, tires, a coffee maker, snow shovel, and a duck punt all at one store.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars! We hope to see you again very soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great experience at this location almost all the time so this is where I try to go. The last couple trips I was lucky to have had the same super helpful guy in tools dept put up with my questions as i figured things out and a really sweet and patient customer service girl (gurpinder?) 5 stars for them too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Tanya! Were glad to hear you enjoyed the service from our team. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Latest experience was great as usual. Aisles are well organized and sale items easy to spot. The scanners to check prices yourself are a helpful way to avoid having to tracking down an employee. Checkout line moved pretty fast considering the gift giving season isnt too far away.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Roydon, thank you for the 5-star review. We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Got what I needed, store employee had to get it from the back. Also picked up some ice salt, 20kg for less than $9 vs $20+ at home depot for 18kg. Of course different brands, but dont think it matters.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! We really appreciate the 5 stars and we hope to see you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I would like to thank so much to one of the staff of this location, this 5* are for you. My husband went today to get a couple of balls for my twins, he asked to one lady and she told him:  they are out of season, we dont sell them anymore even though the website shows availability and units, she didnt even had the courtesy to go and check in the storage, where SHE said she put them yesterday. So, my husband asked to another guy (unfortunately my husband didnt ask for your name) but I want to thank you for your time, your effort and the costumer service you provide You went to the storage, and you found them. Thanks so much! Your management should know about that.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Maria! We hope to see you again very soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: This was for a vehicle service. Booked appointment online. Their staff actually called me ahead of time to change the booking since their inspector wasn t available. Saved me a trip, very good staff to talk with and get things done.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, TH! Your feedback is important to us and we are proud that we were able to provide you with great service. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I ve since gone to another Canadian tire and had a better experience. I m changing this to 5 stars because the Cambie Canadian tire handled orders online much better when there s ambiguity for  in stock  products, and actually following up with the order online _______ From my previous experience How is it that a company this big doesnt know how many items theyre receiving in stock, and then arbitrarily put some number online. Wasted my time. Also many of the menu options on phone didnt even work, had to go in person to find out and be disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Leo, your comment and experience are very important to us. Please feel free to call our customer service number at 1-800-387-8803 so we can help you further. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Got what I want. Fuel tank is a necessary. Although it leaks when I pouring into my motorcycle fuel tank. Still not a big issue. FYI: the cashier will give you the lid set when you check out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your review! Were happy to provide you with everything that you need. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: A great place to shop almost everything but food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dudley, thank you for the 5-star review. We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Fantastic goods of variety and good service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Been to Car Service Center for the RV of my gf (10ft height, modified GMC Savana). The objectives were oil change and general inspection to ensure everythings all right after been to the Rockies and over 8K km trip. They found out few things and (Gary?) was very honest and helpful to us because at first we had in mind to verify other stuff but he explained it wasnt necessary. They provided a complete inspection sheet and told us the most urgent things to do. Thanks to the team for their service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thanks for the 5 stars and for your visit! Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: We went for gardening and indoor plant supplies and found everything there. They are also great for outdoor camping gears!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, we appreciate the 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Booked online for an oil change. Clear communication. No upsell.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Wanted to commend Joel who deals with the online orders for resolving my in-store pickup order.  Although there was a glitch in the system that said it would be delivered to my house, Joel communicated effectively with management to allow me to pick up my item at the original sale price the day after I called.  He also came out to greet me and introduced himself.  Great customer service.  Keep up the good work! Thanks to all the workers who are working tirelessly to keep Canadian businesses functioning during this difficult time
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Arthur! Your feedback is important to us and we are proud that we were able to provide you with great service. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I just went into this store to look for a travel adaptor and was in isle 35 looking for it. I met two staff members who were changing the isle over for Christmas and there was a bunch of boxes piled up in front of where the item was that i needed. The ladies said they didnt have it, so i moved on to find someone else that could help me with the right answer. I found a gentleman by the name of Conner Murphy.... he was the right one!! Energy was awesome and i told him the situation and he stated taking the boxes down and away to get me the charger. This is the above and beyond you look for in companies, and it only took a minute, but made my day. Management please take notice, thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great place to buy car cleaners or washer fluids
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, we really appreciate the 5 stars! Hope to see you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Best Canadian tire in Richmond ! Very friendly and helpful staff. I went to pick up some rat poison today and the ladies at the cashier were beyond helpful. As it was my first time purchasing this product they advised I d have to speak to a poison control specialist otherwise they wouldn t sell me the product to ensure I follow protocol and have knowledge on how to safely use it. I highly recommend you to go to this location beats the other one   !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, were glad to hear you enjoyed the service. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: The best part I love is the clearance section They have so much stuff. Basically one stop shop for the whole family.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thanks for the 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you again. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Very convenient     Needed work boots because my last pair basically split apart and they were able to save me because I needed it for work and they were only 20 minutes away from work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Calvin, thank you for the review! Were happy to hear you had a great experience. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I wanted to buy a battery tester at the Vancouver store yesterday. A clerk told me that they were out of stock, but there was one left at the Richmond store. Today, I parked right by the entrance, found the product right away, and was back in my car in a couple of minutes. I have been quite impressed by the customer service at Canadian Tire lately.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Ken! We are happy to hear that you had an excellent experience and hope to see you again soon. The Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great person I faced who helped me to fix issues in my car. Thanks maximum for him.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Rana! Your feedback is important to us and we are proud that we were able to provide you with great service. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: On Friday November 29th, We pulled into this store, looking for quick service on replacing the light-bulbs on our sons car (we are from out of town).  We met the Service Manager, Kevin, whom promptly looked after our needs.  Kevin was polite, efficient, quick and funny.  We are huge fans of the service that he provided.  THANK YOU Kevin!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Brian! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Kevin in our auto service. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Staff in the retail and the automotive area, are friendly and helpful.  Store is clean and well-spaced.  Items are in stock and often this location has items not found at other Canadian Tire stores. Good prices. Lots of stock.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Teresa! Were happy we re able to provide you with a wide variety of items to choose from, as well as great customer service. Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: This Canadian tire has some really helpful staff and they are quite knowledgeable. I asked where I could find a certain item and  the Canadian Tire staff member led me to the isle and the item. That was definitely a time saver. When i saw the price listed i was not so sure i wanted to spend quite that much money on it and I said that to the him. He said let me do a price check on the item and he said i was in luck. He had located the item advertized in a competitors store and he offered a Price Match.  I was pleasantly surprised and bought the item. Its part of their gaurantee. There is lots of parking there and the store is always stocked up with everything you could want and they bring in lots of items to match the current season as well. They also have mechanics ready to do repairs or install new tires and batteries headlights and more.Please Like to show me I am making a difference. Thx
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Steve! Were happy were able to provide you with great service! Your feedback is important to us! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Love the level of customer service here! Ordered online and had to pick up an item, the staff put everything in my cart and were very quick! Would go here again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hunnain, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: After having a horrible day at the Minit Brake Auto, i went to Canadian Tire at No. 3 Rd for my inspection. And Mr. Sal Mani the senior service executive as more than proffesional. They valued their time as well as our time. Despite of being super busy they knew what to do. Got my inspection done and did my suspension alignment for a reasonable price. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Siddhartha, were happy to hear you enjoyed the service. We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I dropped my wallet in shop,and the staff helped me sent it to police office. And nothing missed. I must say thank you so much!! I really appreciate what youve done.

reviews.review_text: I was there 2 weeks ago looking for the Volvo light bulbs. I didnt get help from two customers service people. They simply pointed me to the isle and look up by myself -Mix and Match if you could. Of course, I did pick up the wrong ones. It was Stanley that helped me out to find the right ones, in addition, he also helped me to find the parts for Volvo coolant recovery cap which I will replace it next time when I visit Canadian Tire Store. I have been happily served by Stanley when he was with the Store located in Coppersmith Shopping Centre in Steveston  Hwy for last couple of years. I didnt know that he has moved to No. 3 Road Store until accidentally found him there. I will come for my future car services there as long as Stanley is there. He is so helpful and a great customer services person.
Excellent service and great products. Was helped by Naujeen, Nawsheen and Harmanjyot they were very good and knowledgeable. I am able to get very good products at great prices for my home renovation.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Sameer! Were glad to hear you had a great experience and we hope to see you again soon. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I had the best visit i just came from Canadian Tire Newton in surrey and they were the WORST!!!! it took me 2 days just to buy a basketball hoop for my boys..and i still had to drive to Richmond. All because the employees at Newton didnt want to go to the back in order to retrive the bb hoop. Even though they told me to come back the following day. But overall Im happy because Richmond Canadian Tire is the only one I will go to again even if it means driving from North Delta. DONT SHOP AT CANADIAN TIRE NEWTON!!!!!!
Joel and Wade in automotive were professional and went above and beyond to ensure quick and efficient service on my vehicle. Rula in customer service was friendly, polite and proficient in the role.
This place has a really competitive prices.

reviews.review_text: Surprisingly large selection of products. I did research on their website beforehand, and everything was where they said it would be.

reviews.review_text: Darren at the automotive parts department, gave me some of the best customer service I have received all year. Thank you Darren.
people in the store seemed to be very knowledgable about everything in the store and the staff are always willing to help
Great place to buy a lot of things sports and house parking available good attention
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review! Were happy we re able to provide you with a wide variety of items to choose from, as well as great customer service.  Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Easy to find parking spot, regular prices are a bit pricer than competitors
Nice store and helpful staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, we really appreciate the 5 stars! See you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Had a great deal on my welder i just bought 300 savings !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Jim! Were happy were able to provide you with great deals all year long. We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Customer service is friendly and helpful
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mark, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Staff were friendly and the shop were pretty organised.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Kat! Your feedback is important to us and we are proud that we were able to provide you with great service. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Organized better than the other branch I have been there.
